title: Žurka
description: Vina, ki držijo tempo in glasnost. Bleščice niso obvezne, so pa zaželjene.

title: Zmenkarije
description: Vina, ki šepetajo sladke neumnosti… in potem mogoče še kaj več.

title: Za taščo
description: Ko rabiš vino, da se neha vtikat v tvojga otroka.

title: Za tasta
description: Ne zajebi situacije. Prinesi mu vino, ki bo njemu kul!

title: Wroooče!
description: Ko švicaš v kopalkah, rabiš vino v kterga lahko vržeš par kock ledu.

title: Vsakodnevci
description: Vina za med tednom, ki te ne obsojajo, tudi če pogledaš tri sezone v enem večeru.

title: Tisti dnevi
description: Veš, kateri dnevi. Ne sprašuj – samo toči.

title: Those days
description: You know the ones. Don't ask, just pour.

title: Sommstuff
description: Niche, nerdy, and not for everyone. But if you’re geeking out over lees contact — you’re home.

title: Something new
description: Tired of Pinot this and Chardonnay that? Welcome to the deep end of the wine pool.

title: Someljejčki
description: Ful lep PH! Kako dolgo na drožeh? In mikroklima? Če s tem ponavadi težiš vinarjem — si doma.

title: Snobby friends?
description: When you need a wine to impress instead of you.

title: Snob?
description: Funky, divja in rahlo nerazumljena. Tako kot ti.

title: Snob much?
description: Funky, wild, and slightly misunderstood. Just like you.

title: Sam doma
description: Ker ne piješ sam, ampak samo vnaprej tejstaš… za obiske, ki pridejo.... enkrat.

title: Sailing
description: For salty air, sunburnt noses, and wines that pair well with rope burns. And bubbly water if you're the skipper!

title: Prepotentni kolegi?
description: Ko rabiš vino, da naredi vtis namesto tebe.

title: Piknik
description: Vina, ki prenesejo travne madeže, plastične kozarce in mlačen sir. Lahkotna, sveža in prijazna do odej.

title: Picnic
description: Wines that don’t mind grass stains, plastic cups, or warm cheese. Easy, breezy, and park-friendly.

title: Peaking
description: These wines are at their peak. Aged, poised, and ready to blow your mind. No climbing gear needed.

title: Parteeey
description: Wines that keep the vibe up and the volume loud. Preferably with glitter.

title: Nice bottle
description: You could drink it, but this bottle sooo nice — it’s perfect for gifting.

title: Netflix & Chill
description: Ko rabiš butelko za boljšo atmosfero .. .pri gledanju filmov.

title: Neki novga
description: Dovolj malvazije in refoška? Dobrodošel v globokem koncu vinskega bazena.

title: Neftlix & Chill
description: When you need a bottle to set the mood for... movie watching.

title: Na vrhuncu
description: Ta vina so na vrhuncu. Zorjena, pripravljena in z eno nogo že v legendi. Brez derez. Na kaj si pa ti pomislil?

title: Lepe Butelke
description: Lahko ga spiješ, ampak je ful lušna butelka - za darilo?

title: Jadranje
description: Za slan zrak, opečena ramena in vina, ki se dobro ujemajo z žulji od vrvi. Pa tudi z radensko če si skipper!

title: Impress her dad
description: Don’t mess this up. Bring a wine he thinks is amazing.

title: Ikone & Legende
description: Ta vina se niso prišla igrat. Prišla so pokazat, kdo je šefe!

title: Icons & Legends
description: These wines didn’t come to play. They came to remind the rest who’s boss.

title: Hot in herre
description: Wines for your ice cubes when you are sweating in your bathing suit.

title: Home alone
description: Because you’re not drinking alone, you’re just pre-tasting before guests arrive… at some point.

title: For mother in law
description: When you need a wine to keep her out of your parenting decisions.

title: Date night
description: Wines that whisper sweet nothings… and then maybe a little something more.

title: Daily Boozers
description: Weekday wines that go down easy and don’t judge your bingeing.
